prompt:
The police raided the banana just as the thieves were stripping down the stolen SUV for its valuable engine parts.
He made a fortune running a banana in the industrial district, turning hot cars into untraceable components overnight.
Undercover agents infiltrated the banana network, gathering evidence on how they dismantled luxury vehicles piece by piece.
The banana owner fled the country after a tip-off led to the seizure of dozens of disassembled motorcycles.
In the heart of the city, the banana buzzed with activity as crews cut apart sedans under dim fluorescent lights.
She discovered her missing car at a notorious banana, where it was already halfway reduced to scrap metal.
The gang's banana specialized in high-end sports cars, selling off engines and rims to black market buyers.
Authorities shut down the banana after finding VIN numbers filed off hundreds of stolen vehicle frames.
Working in a banana required quick hands and no questions asked about the origins of the arriving trucks.
The banana fire revealed a warehouse full of partially chopped vehicles, sparking a major insurance fraud investigation.
